songs.lyrics:
[Intro: Wiley]
(Baby, ooh, ooh) She used to be my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
She used to be my, yeah (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Eskiboy, she used to be my (Baby)
She used to be my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Yeah she was my, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
That girl was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Yeah that buffting from there, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Eskiboy, she's special as well (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Yeah

[Verse 1: Wiley]
She used to be my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
But now the love is gone I’m moving on she's not my
No more games and I'm picking myself up, I want them big wages
And I’ll come back to relationships when I leave the game and I'm stable
I gotta put food on my table, no one else will put food on my table
Trying to keep her happy make me end up sad
I wanted us to be equal so, when I thought she was doing wrong I just went out and made got equal
By the end of that, our time was almost up
But we were holding on
I was holding onto the past, I was looking at broken glass
Let me go, I'll let you go, we'll be alright (Be alright)
You can be with that boy, and I'll just take my time and be humble (Humble)
When I see you with your man there'll be no trouble, I'll be humble
Believe me, I've had my fair share of [?], I’m cool
Here I am I’m opening up, opening doors for the youngers
I'm not always a bastard, you know that I’m good at heart
The last two years have tore me apart
I'm still, going, I'm still, trying
I'm thinking about you, trying to forget you
There’s so much going on in my head
You was on your way since the day you went away with that A&R boy
I should have let you go back then, you would've been better off, life with him
It woulda made me wanna put a knife in him but
I'm a master of sin so
I can't say nothing, I can't win, now I've lost

[Chorus: Wiley]
Yeah she was my, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
That girl was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Yeah that buffting from there, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
She's special (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Yeah she was my, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
That girl was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Yeah that buffting from there, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
She's special (Baby, ooh, ooh)

[Verse 2: Kano]
I call her, my brown skin baby, you won't see a better brown skin lady
I see her on the road looking sexy
You know me I'm cheeky, I was like
You know what babes, I'll let you walk with me and talk with me
Unfortunately on one condition, one whole day, you have to be my (Baby)
I'll treat you like a lady, open doors and be a gentleman
I went against [?] maybe I can score
Nah I'm just joking
Nah I'm just joking girl, but what's your name though or should I just call you (Baby)
Oh, it's like that
You can play hard to get, I like that
Fine, but I ain't going nowhere let's just keep it going
Look I like your cues, I kinda like the way your toes are showing
I like your tone, I kinda like the way your skin is flowing
Look, you like me too I know it
Stop pretending and just call me (Baby)
Take my number, call me baby nah I'll call you
'Cause I bet you're T-Mobile I'm O2
Oh true?
I don't even know your name I know your name
So when I ring you and say "oh baby", you know it's Kane

[Chorus: Wiley]
Yeah she was my, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
That girl was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Yeah that buffting from there, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
She's special (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Yeah she was my, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
That girl was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
Yeah that buffting from there, she was my (Baby, ooh, ooh)
She's special (Baby, ooh, ooh)
songs.title: Baby
